attributes.title: How to become a better CRO professional, with Abi Hough & Craig Sullivan
attributes.summary: We know you can improve the digital customer experience, but how do you improve yourself? Abi & Craig show to keep learning & developing as a CRO professional
attributes.description: Guest 1: Abi Hough URL: https://www.cro.cafe/guest/abi-hough | Guest 2: Craig Sullivan URL: https://www.cro.cafe/guest/craig-sullivan
